Text:
Gracias al moderador Gargravar, mi cuenta ha sido reactivada.
Por lo visto he sufrido el ataque de un hacker, espero compartir con vosotros la buena musica durante mucho tiempo.

Thanks to moderator Gargravar, my account has been reactivated.
Apparently I have been attacked by a hacker, I hope to share with you the good music for a long time.
